labels_descriptions.Organisation: A legal/entity body within or connected to Parliament (e.g., House of Commons, House of Lords, HM Treasury).
labels_descriptions.Team: An operational unit providing finance, procurement, HR, audit, or service delivery functions (e.g., Accounts Receivable, Financial Accounting).
labels_descriptions.PersonRole: A named role/title with responsibilities or delegated authority (e.g., Accounting Officer, MD of FPP, Finance Business Partner).
labels_descriptions.CommitteeOrBoard: A governance body or board providing oversight/approval (e.g., Finance Committee, CEB, Commission, JIB, AEARAC).
labels_descriptions.Policy: A formal policy document governing conduct or procedures (e.g., Debt Management Policy, Credit Management Policy).
labels_descriptions.Handbook: A compiled guidance document containing rules and policies (e.g., Finance Rules Handbook, Staff Handbook).
labels_descriptions.Rule: A specific mandated requirement or prohibition (e.g., no offsetting sales and purchases; no direct debits).
labels_descriptions.Framework: A structured set of principles/controls for managing a domain area (e.g., Internal Control framework, Change Control framework, Risk framework).
labels_descriptions.Process: A defined workflow for performing an activity (e.g., P2P, debt recovery, engaging externals, receipting, reporting fraud).
labels_descriptions.Plan: A financial or investment plan (e.g., MTFP, MTIP, Estimate).
labels_descriptions.Report: A recurring or formal report for oversight/transparency (e.g., Annual Report and Accounts, Financial Monitoring Report, MTIP finance report).
labels_descriptions.DocumentForm: A specific template/form used to initiate/record actions (e.g., FO30, FO35, FO7b, Commercial Request Form).
labels_descriptions.System: An information system used to record/approve finance activities (e.g., HAIS, iTrent, event management system).
labels_descriptions.FinancialInstrument: A payment/holding mechanism (e.g., Government Procurement Card, bank account, petty cash).
labels_descriptions.FinancialTransaction: A transaction type such as invoice, payment, internal recharge, virement, prepayment, refund.
labels_descriptions.FinancialConcept: An accounting/finance concept or classification (e.g., budget, capital vs resource, contingent liability, provision, loss, write-off).
labels_descriptions.Asset: A tangible/intangible item requiring safeguarding/recording (e.g., property, fixed assets, attractive items, inventories, heritage assets).
labels_descriptions.RiskEvent: An adverse event or incident (e.g., fraud, theft, overpayment, data loss, overdue debt).
labels_descriptions.ComplianceRequirement: A mandatory external/internal compliance obligation (e.g., IR35 assessment, procurement regulations, data security duties).
labels_descriptions.AuthorisationThreshold: A value-based limit/threshold determining approval route and approver(s).
labels_descriptions.Agreement: A formal agreement between parties (e.g., MoU, SLA, contract, COT3 settlement agreement).
labels_descriptions.Service: A service provided internally or externally (e.g., catering, events, retail, shared services).
labels_descriptions.ProjectOrProgramme: A structured change initiative requiring governance and investment approval (projects/programmes; including category A/B).
labels_descriptions.TaxScheme: A tax regime/scheme relevant to engagements or payments (e.g., IR35, CIS, VAT).
labels_descriptions.AuditBody: An internal or external audit/assurance organisation (e.g., Internal Audit, National Audit Office).
